code: import React from'react';import'./ExpenseDate.css';import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ExpenseDate=props=>{console.log('props.date',props.year);const year=props.date.getFullYear();const month=props.date.toLocaleString('en-US',{month:'long'});const day=props.date.toLocaleString('en-US',{day:'2-digit'});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"expense-date",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"expense-day",children:[day," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"expense-date__month",children:[month," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"expense-year",children:[year," "]})]});};export default ExpenseDate;
